reviews.review_title: Hôtel au calme dans le centre de Lorient
reviews.positive_text: L'hôtel est très bien placé à deux pas du centre ville. L'hôtel est calme et bien insonorisé. L'équipe est sympathique et veille à répondre à la moindre question. Le petit déjeuner dispose de produits frais et locaux (avec du vrai far breton) et est régulièrement rapprovisionné pour qu'on ne manque de rien.
reviews.negative_text: La réception ferme à 20h, ce qui n'est pas très grave, avec le digicode. Pas d'ascenseur.

reviews.positive_text: This is a pleasant hotel, well located for the festival (our reason for coming). We had breakfast one day and it was good. Reception were welcoming and there was parking on site.
reviews.negative_text: The toilet is ridiculously small and the door opens the wrong way. A larger person would find it impossible to use. I suggest some renovation needed. (our room was no 11).

reviews.positive_text: Good value. Clean, basic rooms. Nice breakfast selection.  Secure parking at rear of property.

reviews.review_title: An average stay enhanced by the lovely staff.
reviews.positive_text: The staff very helpful and pleasant
reviews.negative_text:
No tea and coffee in room.  Unable to do more than sleep in the room, so no way to relax in the room. 
A shame to have to pay for the cup of tea we requested from reception after a tiring day.  
Breakfast was a little disappointing as there were no cornflakes packets, muesli seemed a bit sweet and no bread we could see that could be toasted.  The bacon and scrambled ages were however very nice.

reviews.positive_text:
The Hotel itself and the location which was convenient
Also, friendly staff.

Lovely hotel . Close to all the city center restaurants , walking distance . If you travel by car make arrangements for parking which was €10 in the back of the hotel . Breakfast was lovely , not just cereal and croissants . They also have scrambled eggs and bacon , lovely coffee . Very clean and tasty . They also have a free water fountain , with still and sparkling, nice to fill up my bottle for a day at the beach . Lovely bed , nice balcony , tidy bathroom .
reviews.negative_text: Two of the plugs in the room weren’t working , but there were other available  .

reviews.positive_text:
- Great staff

Excellent location in the center, very quiet, a ten minutes walk from the railway station. This is an extremely clean place with a very good buffet breakfast.
reviews.negative_text: The room was relatively small, with little space for luggage, but this is no problem at all for a short stay. Considering the three stars rating, the facilities are very good.

Perfekt für die Übernachtung vor der Abfahrt mit der Fähre. Sehr gutes Frühstück
Ci sono cose che non corrispondono alla descrizione.
reviews.negative_text:
Due criticità fondamentali: si accede ai piani solo a piedi. Non c'è ascensore. È vero che non era tra le dotazioni descritte, ma una carenza come questa va segnalata perché può mettere in difficoltà. Ovviamente si dà per scontata la presenza in caso di più piani, e quando si prenota non c'è modo di saperlo.
L'altro aspetto negativo è nel water fuori dalla stanza da bagno, microscopico (100x80) e non ventilato. Quasi impossibile anche svestirsi, lavarsi poi...allego foto.
Una vergogna!

reviews.review_title: Ormai la nostra scelta a Lorient
reviews.positive_text: Quando veniamo per lavoro soggiorniamo sempre presso questo hotel. Ci troviamo bene.
reviews.negative_text: Nulla da dire di negativo a parte forse che la pulizia nella stanza potrebbe essere leggermente più accurata.

reviews.review_title: It was a good location and good value.
